p: Each viral sequence from our study was assigned a subtype based on an analysis performed with automated HIV-1 subtyping tools ( S1 Table). The geographic distribution of HIV-1 subtypes among PWID is depicted in Fig 1. Overall, subtype A1 strains were dominant (75.2%) followed by CRF02_AG (14.1%), recombinants/unassigned (7.2%), CRF35_AD (2.1%), G (1.0%) and C (0.3%).
